description: Gets detailed information about an Add On instance.

parameters.name: AddonInstanceId
parameters.description: The Add On instance ID to retrieve information for.

nested_items.name: AddonInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Add On instance.

nested_items.name: AddonName
nested_items.description: The name of the Add On provider associated to the subscription of the instance.

nested_items.name: AddonSubscriptionId
nested_items.description: The subscription ID associated to the instance.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Add On instance was created.
